Title: Sin of Omission
Plot: Dexter uses lessons he learned from Brother Sam to follow up on some new leads in the Doomsday investigation; Debra butts heads with Captain LaGuerta over the case of a dead call girl.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Horror,violence,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Aimee Garcia, Billy Brown, Molly Parker, Josh Cooke, Rya Kihlstedt, William Morgan Sheppard
